Artifacts Version Maven Plugin
Last Published: 2020-10-16  | Version: 1.0.2-SNAPSHOT
Overview
  • Introduction
  • Goals
  • Usage
Project Documentation
  • Project Information
  • Project Reports

Usage

Unpack the dependency to a specific location.

<project>
  [...]
  <build>
    <plugins>
      <plugin>
        <groupId>com.mpobjects.maven</groupId>
        <artifactId>artifact-versions-maven-plugin</artifactId>
        <version>1.0.2-SNAPSHOT</version>
        <executions>
          <execution>
            <id>unpack-artifact</id>
            <goals>
              <goal>unpack</goal>
            </goals>
            <configuration>
              <artifact>com.example:artifact:[2.0,3)</artifact>
              <destinationDirectory>/tmp/example</destinationDirectory>
            </configuration>
          </execution>
        </executions>
      </plugin>
    </plugins>
  </build>
  [...]
</project>
